Package io.github.clojang.gradldromus

Class AnsiColors

java.lang.Object
io.github.clojang.gradldromus.AnsiColors
public class AnsiColors extends Object
Utility class for handling ANSI color codes and terminal text formatting. Provides constants for various colors and methods for colorizing text output.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnsiColors

      public AnsiColors(boolean useColors)
      Creates a new AnsiColors instance.
      Parameters:
      useColors - whether to apply colors or return plain text

  • Method Details

    • colorize

      public String colorize(String text, String... colors)
      Applies the specified ANSI color codes to the given text. If colors are disabled, returns the original text unchanged.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to colorize
      colors - the ANSI color codes to apply
      Returns:
      the colorized text, or original text if colors are disabled or text is null

    • stripAnsi

      public static String stripAnsi(String text)
      Removes all ANSI escape codes from the given text.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to strip ANSI codes from
      Returns:
      the text with all ANSI codes removed, or null if input is null
